on reading compounds: 狐狸【コリ】foxes and tanuki, sly fellow, deceiver
kun reading compounds: 狸【たぬき】tanuki (Nyctereutes procyonoides), raccoon dog, sly dog, sly old fox, sly fox, cunning devil, craftiness, sly person, someone who makes evil plans without ever breaking their poker face
狸饂飩【たぬきうどん】noodles with bits of deep-fried tempura batter
